title: Tic-Tac-Row
description: Experience strategic gameplay with my Java-based X and O creation, leveraging OOP principles and 2D arrays for an engaging twist on the classic game

title: Cuisine Craft
description: Crafted a Food Recipe app using JavaScript to fetch recipes from MealDB. Led front-end development and database integration, showcasing JavaScript skills.

title: Chat Connect
description: Developed a real-time chat app with Node.js and React.js. Enabled one-on-one messaging, group creation, and file sharing. Integrated user authentication via ChatEngine.io.

title: Stock price data feed
description: Built an interface with a stock price data feed and visually displayed data to assist our traders as a Software Engineer at JPMorgan  Job Sim
